mapper.select: SELECT soc_seq, mb_id, soc_title, soc_position, soc_team, soc_content, soc_create_at, soc_update_at FROM jsp.soccer order by soc_update_at desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jsp.soccer ( mb_id, soc_title, soc_position, soc_team, soc_content ) VALUES ( #{mbId}, #{socTitle}, #{socPosition}, #{socTeam}, #{socContent} )

INSERT INTO jsp.files ( soc_seq, mb_id, up_original_file_name, up_new_file_name, up_file_path, up_file_size ) VALUES ( #{socSeq}, #{mbId}, #{upOriginalFileName}, #{upNewFileName}, #{upFilePath}, #{upFileSize} )
mapper.update: UPDATE jsp.soccer SET soc_seq=#{socSeq}, mb_id=#{mbId}, soc_title=#{socTitle}, soc_position=#{socPosition}, soc_team=#{socTeam}, soc_content=#{socContent}, soc_update_at=now() WHERE soc_seq=#{socSeq}

UPDATE jsp.files SET soc_seq=#{socSeq}, mb_id=#{mbId}, up_original_file_name=#{upOriginalFileName}, up_new_file_name=#{upNewFileName}, up_file_path=#{upFilePath}, up_file_size=#{upFileSize} WHERE soc_seq=#{socSeq}
